pages.text: Ivoites is ammonoid cephalopod known from Devonian Hunsr√ºck Slate, Germany. Like Ordovician nautiloid Aphetoceras, it is characterized with a loosely coiled shell. This seems to indicate the evolution of bactritids with straight shells into ammonoids with coiled shells.
